name: Navigator (itch) (Onygox)
description:
Guide your boat to the island using the compass while avoiding or breaking obstacles . Drag and drop paths for your boat to follow.

Clear mist away by waving your mouse above it.
Click repeatedly on objects to destroy them.



WIN by reaching the island safely. You will LOSE if the boat has no valid path to go on or if you hit an obstacle or if you leave the grid.

Made in three days for #GlobalGameJam2021 with the theme "Lost and Found".

FEATURES:

• A near-infinite amount of procedurally generated levels

• A 10-color muted palette

• Music inspired by Return of the Obra Dinn

CREDITS

• Follow @onygox on Twitter

• Music by ONE ABE

• Sound effects by Kenney and NS Studios
